ansc<-read.table("http://www.biw.kuleuven.be/vakken/statisticsbyR/SDVbyR/AnscombeExtended.txt")

names(ansc)<-c('Group','X','Y')

ansc

ansc1<-subset(ansc,Group==1)
ansc2<-subset(ansc,Group==2)
ansc3<-subset(ansc,Group==3)
ansc4<-subset(ansc,Group==4)
ansc5<-subset(ansc,Group==5)

Areg1<-lm(Y~X,ansc1)
Areg2<-lm(Y~X,ansc2)
Areg3<-lm(Y~X,ansc3)
Areg4<-lm(Y~X,ansc4)
Areg5<-lm(Y~X,ansc5)

ansc1reg<-lm(Y~X , data= ansc , subset= Group==1)

anova(Areg1)
anova(Areg2)
anova(Areg3)
anova(Areg4)
anova(Areg5)

summary(Areg1)
summary(Areg2)
summary(Areg3)
summary(Areg4)
summary(Areg5)

plot(Y~X,ansc1)
abline(Areg1)
plot(Y~X,ansc2)
abline(Areg2)
plot(Y~X,ansc3)
abline(Areg3)
plot(Y~X,ansc4)
abline(Areg4)
plot(Y~X,ansc5)
abline(Areg1)

op <- par(mfrow = c(2,3), pty= "m")

 # 2 x 3 pictures on one plot
plot(Y~X,ansc1); abline(Areg1);plot(Y~X,ansc2); abline(Areg2);plot(Y~X,ansc3); abline(Areg3);
plot(Y~X,ansc4); abline(Areg4);plot(Y~X,ansc5); abline(Areg5)

par(op)
